mapper.insert: insert into question (subjectCode, examName, qNumber, qInfo, qPoint, answer) values (#{subjectCode}, #{examName}, #{qNumber}, #{qInfo}, #{qPoint}, #{answer})
insert into exam (subjectCode, examName, startTime, endTime) values (#{subjectCode},#{examName},#{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.delete: delete from exam where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName=#{examName}
